tool_description: An API to show worldwide news about Covid-19 in Portuguese.
name: Covid News in Portuguese
title: Covid News in Portuguese

api_list.name: Get Individual Source News
api_list.description: Get news avout Covid in Portuguese from a specific news resource,
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-in-portuguese.p.rapidapi.com/news/jn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-in-portuguese.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-in-portuguese.p.rapidapi.com/news/{siteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-in-portuguese.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Covid News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Covid news in Portuguese.
